Sentencas: In this article, the role of the preparation route and calcinations temperature on the thermal expansion and conductivity of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-delta (BCY) has been studied.
Titulo: Influence of synthesis route on morphology and conduction behavior of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ

Sentencas: In particular, the samples were synthesized by means of the solid-state reaction and by a sol-gel route.
Titulo: Influence of synthesis route on morphology and conduction behavior of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ

Sentencas: BCY has been suggested as proton conducting electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Influence of synthesis route on morphology and conduction behavior of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ

Sentencas: Proton conductivity strongly depends on the densification of the material as well as the crystal structure, which is generally influenced by the preparation procedure.
Titulo: Influence of synthesis route on morphology and conduction behavior of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ

Sentencas: It was found that a single phase material could be achieved at 1000 A degrees C for the samples prepared through the sol-gel route with similar to 96% packing density.
Titulo: Influence of synthesis route on morphology and conduction behavior of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ

Sentencas: In case of ceramic route, single phase could be obtained at higher temperatures (1200 A degrees C) and does not lead to good density values.
Titulo: Influence of synthesis route on morphology and conduction behavior of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ

Sentencas: The ceramic synthesis produces BCY material in cubic symmetry where as the gel-citrate complexation route leads to homogenous orthorhombic BCY.
Titulo: Influence of synthesis route on morphology and conduction behavior of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ

Sentencas: The conductivity measurements of sample synthesized by two different routes were investigated by means of impedance spectroscopy and electron microscopy.
Titulo: Influence of synthesis route on morphology and conduction behavior of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ

Sentencas: A comparative study of thermal expansion behavior of BCY synthesized by different route was carried out.
Titulo: Influence of synthesis route on morphology and conduction behavior of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-δ
